a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan:
Energy consumption is measured in
terawatt-hours
, in terms of direct
primary energy
. This means that fossil
fuels include the energy lost due to inefficiencies in energy production.
Data source: Energy Institute - Statistical Review of World Energy (2024); Smil (2017)
Note: In the absence of more recent data, traditional biomass is assumed constant since 2015.
